flavor: Tavish left home to forge his own path. But it still led him back to Alterac to kick some Frostwolf butt.
name: Beaststalker Tavish
text: [x]Battlecry: Discover and cast 2 Improved Secrets.

flavor: Magister is a humble title for one who united warring armies against the greatest threat to Azeroth.
name: Magister Dawngrasp
text: [x]Battlecry: Recast a spell from each spell school you've cast this game.

flavor: As strong-willed and stubborn as her first day in the Horde, Rokara now wielded a weapon that rivaled even her tenacity.
name: Rokara, the Valorous
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/2 Unstoppable Force.

flavor: Sneaking behind enemy lines isn't so different from being a line cook. People are hostile, something's on fire, and your only hope is to get out of there with all your fingers.
name: Shadowcrafter Scabbs
text: [x]Battlecry: Return all minions to their owner's hands. Summon two 4/2 Shadows with Stealth.

flavor: "I dedicated my life to vanquishing demons, but I never thought to face the demons in me. Maybe, in time, I can help quell the demons in you." -Kurtrus, to Cariel
name: Kurtrus, Demon-Render
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon two 1/4 Demons with Rush. (Improved by your hero attacks this game.)

flavor: Guff faced his biggest challenge yet: making friends on a battlefield.
name: Wildheart Guff
text: [x]Battlecry: Set your maximum Mana to 20. Gain an empty Mana Crystal. Draw a card.

flavor:
Her faith, unshakable.
Her shield, immovable.
Her enemies, irredeemable.
name: Lightforged Cariel
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemies. Equip a 2/5 Immovable Object.

flavor: Xyrella thought she was only saving her daughter. Her actions may very well have saved the entire world.
name: Xyrella, the Devout
text: [x]Battlecry: Trigger the Deathrattle of every friendly minion that died this game.

flavor: The elements crackled through Bru'kan's veins and his life flashed before his eyes. He knew this moment would come, but he wondered, had he given them enough?
name: Bru'kan of the Elements
text: [x]Battlecry: Call upon the power of two Elements!

flavor: At a certain point, you stop mocking death and start becoming it.
name: Dreadlich Tamsin
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all minions. Shuffle 3 Rifts into your deck. Draw 3 cards.

flavor: Earnable on the Fractured in Alterac Valley Tavern Pass.

flavor: Earnable on the Fractured in Alterac Valley Tavern Pass.
name: Vol'jin, Frostwolf Officer

artist:
The "M.V.P." stands for Most Valuable Petowner.
Obtainable from a Battle Bash.
name: M.V.P. Nguyen
Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Don't bother asking her for drinks. She will never serve.

flavor: Catch him Teron up the Battlegrounds.
name: Teron Gorefiend
Bru'kan

name: Vapos
text: The waters of the oasis will rise to protect its secrets.

text: Tamsin must complete the ritual and summon Anetheron before she is overrun.

name: Bru'kan
text:
[x]Bru'kan, Rokara, and Guff
will not sit by and let Tamsin
destroy a whole city.

name: Elfarran
text:
Pirates are quite effective in battle,
if you have the coin.

name: A Cheesemonger
text:
Undercover SI:7 agents are
all over Stormwind, in places
you would never suspect.

name: Hooktusk
text: Booty Bay is quite close to Gurubashi Arena, don't you know.

name: Kurtrus
text: As Cariel falls wounded, the demon hunter turns his glaives upon the warlock Tamsin Roame.

name: Xyrella
text:
[x]Xyrella sought knowledge
of the naaru's power, but
found Tamsin at Stormwind
Cathedral instead.

name: Anetheron
text:
[x]Cariel finds Kurtrus in
the dreadlord's grip.
She must free Kurtrus!

name: Anetheron
text: The dreadlord towers over the city. He must be stopped!

name: Cornelius Roame
text: Cariel returns home to Stormwind unaware that Tamsin's attack on the city is imminent.

name: Kurtrus Ashfallen
text: [x]Unconscious during the fight on Dreadmist Peak, Cariel wakes from her dream to find Tamsin fled and Kurtrus enraged.

name: A Twisted Monstrosity
text: Tamsin's cruel treatment of her father has resulted in his current...condition.

name: Tamsin
text:
Clinging to her memories
of times long past,
Cariel steps through the graveyard to face her sister.

name: Xur'gon
text:
[x]Demons are everywhere,
and Cariel fights to secure
the Dwarven District where
Tavish is pinned down.

name: Tamsin Roame
text:
Years ago, in Stormwind, Cornelius Roame demanded much of his daughters
Tamsin and Cariel.

name: Cookie

name: Hogger

name: Mr. Smite
text: [x]The Defias plan to smuggle the shards of naaru out of Stormwind via pirate ship!

name: Lady Prestor

name: Sneed

name: Campfire
text: The mercenaries stare into the fire and wonder if this is the last night some of them will ever see.

name: Galvangar

name: Kazakus

name: Kazakusan

name: Morloch

name: Rokara
text: Upon her return home, Rokara was granted her own Frostwolf war party.

name: Vanndar
text: [x]Tavish left the Stormpikes to walk his own path, but now that path has led him back to Vanndar.

name: Campfire
text: The campfire burns, granting a brief reprieve from the darkness...

name: Wing Commander Ichman
text: [x]This wing commander is a top pilot. They call him the Heart of the Gryphon.

name: Lokholar, the Ice Lord
text: Lokholar draws power from the mortal conflict in Alterac.

name: Taskmaster Snivvle
text: They say whoever wears the lantern crown is the kobold king.

name: Dreadlich Tamsin
text: Tamsin has returned, empowered by the naaru's void energy.

name: Dreadlich Tamsin

name: Vanndar Stormpike

text: [x]After Prince Kael'thas betrayed his people, they did not look kindly on his apprentice Dawngrasp.

name: Onyxia of the Void
text: [x]Onyxia's defenses are strong. Find the lethal attack and slay the dragon.

text: [x]Infused with the void naaru's power, the undead dragon hunts Dawngrasp and Xyrella.

name: King Varian
text: [x]The King of Stormwind has returned, and with his allies plans to march on Onyxia's Lair.

flavor: "Of course I've gone mad with power. Ever try going mad without it?"
name: Dr. Boom, Mad Genius
text: Battlecry: For the rest of the game, your Mechs have Rush.

flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"
howToEarnGolden: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Warlock.
name: Lord Jaraxxus
text: Battlecry: Equip a 3/8 Blood Fury.

flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."
name: Thrall, Deathseer
text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.

flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."
name: Valeera the Hollow
text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.

flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."
name: Deathstalker Rexxar
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.

flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."

name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that died this game.

flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."
name: Malfurion the Pestilent
text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.

flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."

text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.

flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."

text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3 Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.

text: Chomper survives the sewers by snacking on smaller minions.

text: Step 1: Open portal. Step 2: Minions fight. Step 3: ...Victory?

name: "Scourgelord" Dazzik
text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3 Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.

text: This old tree is full of knowledge to drop.

text: Can't stop, won't stop, the boogie woogie!

text: Guards! GUARDS!!

text: Trapped for years in Outland, Vargoth found new sources of magic.

name: Lilayell Suntear
text: She makes the instability of the universe work for her.

text: She would sell a soul for more minions. Not hers, of course.

name: Commander Bolan
text: Be careful, he's got an enormous exclamation point over his head.

name: Bartendotron
text: Sometimes you want to go where everybody knows your deck.

name: Bartender Bob
text: Sometimes you want to go where everybody knows your deck.

name: Galakrond, Azeroth's End

text: Incorporeal or not, those claws hurt!

text: An iron gut, and quite the throwing arm.

text: Gnarled, twisting roots, splintering to life.

text: It’s good to give blood. But not to him. He’s not a real doctor.

name: Cultist S'thara
text: A silver tongue to accompany her silver daggers.

name: Vitus the Exiled
text: Corrupted. Banished. Hungry.

name: Shudderwock
text: [x]And 'lo in uffish thought he stood, crying "Battle" in the wood.

name: Infinite Toki
text: One either dies a hero or mangles time enough to become a villain.

name: Glinda Crowskin
text: The leader of Hagatha’s dark cult hides behind her loyal minions.

name: The Whisperer
text: Do you hear the echoes of his whispers?

name: Garrow, the Rancorous
text: Missing? Dead? He'll still collect.

name: Crooked Pete
text: The locals report that Pete is up to no good again.

name: Cragtorr
text: Seeds sewn from hatred, sustained by dark magic.

name: Azalina Soulthief
text: [x]Her children's safety is her top priority. At any cost.

name: Face Collector
text: [x]Beware his terrible minions and their ever-shifting faces.

name: Raeth Ghostsong
text: There's a reason you should burn the dead.

name: Grum
text: Grum likes to smash. He also likes to bash. And crash.

name: Lord Godfrey
text: The Lord of Shadowfang Keep has a bullet to pick with Crowley.

name: Captain Shivers
text: Vowing vengeance, his cursed crew haunts Gilnean shores.

name: Gustave, the Gutripper
text: Hagatha’s pet eats his way from the bottom of the food chain up.

name: Sephira Dusktalon
text: Even your own magic can be twisted by these woods.

name: Winslow Tobtock
text: His tricks will leave you both in a daze.

name: Gobbles
text: Every dying beast makes this dreaded carrion bird stronger.

name: Ratcatcher Hannigul
text: Rats aren't always the most loyal pets.

name: Plaguemaster Rancel
text: Dying to his touch is terrible. Living is even worse.

flavor: "Do not be afraid. Approach. The dead will sleep… for now."
name: Thrall, Deathseer
text: Battlecry: Transform your minions into random ones that cost (2) more.

flavor: "Run away. Hide in your precious keeps, behind your walls and your bodyguards. Night always falls, and shadows will fill your hallowed halls. One day, one of those shadows will be me."
name: Valeera the Hollow
text: Battlecry: Gain Stealth until your next turn.

flavor: "You were too slow, old friend. The hunt began long ago. And now... it will never end."
name: Deathstalker Rexxar
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

flavor: "Step forward. Confess! Once I was a mere servant of the Light. Now I alone stand in judgement."
name: Uther of the Ebon Blade
text: Battlecry: Equip a 5/3 Lifesteal weapon.

flavor: "I will tell you what Velen never taught me. Whosoever stands before the Light… inevitably casts a shadow."
name: Shadowreaper Anduin
text: Battlecry: Destroy all minions with 5 or more Attack.

flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"
name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that died this game.

flavor: "Cenarius once taught me about the precarious balance between life and death. I have come to understand: there IS no balance. Death always wins."
name: Malfurion the Pestilent
text: [x]Choose One - Summon 2 Poisonous Spiders; or 2 Scarabs with Taunt.

flavor: "Arthas was a spoiled child, playing with toys he could neither control nor understand. Come into the cold. I will show you the true power of the Frozen Throne."
name: Frost Lich Jaina
text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a 3/6 Water Elemental. Your Elementals have Lifesteal this game.

flavor: "You dare to challenge me? Come! Draw your last breath - and then, you are mine."
name: Scourgelord Garrosh
text: Battlecry: Equip a 4/3 Shadowmourne that also damages adjacent minions.

name: Waxmancer Sturmi
text: This kobold can candle-craft minions at will.

name: Pathmaker Hamm
text: There's more than one way for a kobold to dig a tunnel.

name: Blackseed
text: This furbolg’s dark magic twists the other dungeonfolk.

name: Frostfur
text: These furbolg warrens feel unnaturally cold...

name: Graves the Cleric
text: This healing adventurer was separated from his old party.

name: Overseer Mogark
text: This trogg commander is extra "motivational" to underlings.

name: Candlebeard
text: This kobold pirate's favorite move is chaaaarrrge!

name: Thaddock the Thief
text: One moment her minions are there... the next... gone!

name: George and Karl
text: These tag-team paladins went missing in Un'goro.

name: Spiritspeaker Azun
text: This troll priest speaks with the dead... twice.

name: Battlecrier Jin'zo
text: When he calls in the troops, they listen. Twice.

name: Giant Rat
text: The bane of every young adventurer.

name: Gutmook
text: This trogg elder and his minions flock toward sources of magic.

name: Brimstone Warden
text: At all costs, stop him from waking the ancient guardians...

name: Gnosh the Greatworm
text: Always looking to devour the largest, tastiest minions.

name: Tad
text: Look, this murloc just wants to fish, okay?

name: Bristlesnarl
text: This legendary furbolg hunter can quickly call on big friends.

name: The Mothergloop
text: Don't let its growing, gooey friends get out of hand.

name: Vustrasz the Ancient
text: His vast treasure stores are for the taking... if you dare!

name: Xol the Unscathed
text: She's got her eyes on you. ALL of her eyes.

name: Waxmancer Sturmi
text: This kobold can candle-craft minions at will.

name: Pathmaker Hamm
text: There's more than one way for a kobold to dig a tunnel.

text: This furbolg’s dark magic twists the other dungeonfolk.

text: This trogg commander is extra "motivational" to underlings.

text: This kobold pirate's favorite move is chaaaarrrge!

name: Karl and George
text: These tag-team paladins went missing in Un'goro.

name: Gutmook
text: This trogg elder and his minions flock toward sources of magic.

name: Azari, the Devourer
text: The most terrible of demons is loose! And VERY hungry.

name: Elder Brandlemar
text: The bane of magic users, this furbolg can counter any spell.

name: Ixlid
text: Its deadly spores can kill an adventurer instantly!

name: Lyris the Wild Mage
text: She loves fire. Her minions love that she loves fire.

name: Voodoomaster Vex
text: He wants to be a troll. He cries for battle and rattles for death.

name: Kraxx
text: This ancient stone guardian prefers the loot to stay here.

name: Seriona
text: A twilight dragon bent on draining your minions.

name: Whompwhisker
text: A kobold berserker who never fights alone.

name: Elder Jari
text: This furbolg elder calls arcane energies to her defense.

name: Jeeru
text: Don't rub the lamp! You rubbed the lamp, didn't you?

name: Wee Whelp
text: It's just a baby dragon. But it's still a dragon.

name: Bink the Burglar
text: This low-down thief preys on starting adventurers.

name: Fungalmancer Flurgl
text: The fungalmancer empowers his friends. With fungus.

name: Lava-Filled Chamber
text: The kobolds attempted to board up this lava-filled chamber!

name: Trapped Room
text: Tread carefully. Don't... touch... anything!

name: The Darkness
text: There's a reason to always keep a light on down here.

name: Mushhuckster Max
text: You probably don't want the potions he's hocking.

name: Russell the Bard
text: His tunes are catchy. Just ask your minions.

name: Treasure Vault
text: Grab all you can, as fast as you can!

name: Chronomancer Inara
text: Once she powers up, beware of her mastery of time!

name: A. F. Kay
text: Waylay this adventurer while she isn't paying attention!

name: King Togwaggle
text: Look out! He's loaded with loot from failed adventurers.

name: Example Hero
text: This Hero has Examples of a lot of Triggers to Copy From

Brann's ready to finish this.

text:
[x]Whether she needs magic
or a trusty machete, Elise 
is ready to save Uldum.

name: Sir Finley
text:
[x]Sir Finley rides into battle,
ready to dispense justice 
against his final foe.

name: Aethas Sunreaver
text: He represents the Horde members in the Kirin Tor, but his days are numbered.

name: Archmage Antonidas
text: He's the only teacher Jaina would ever need! She just has to convince him first.

name: Archimonde
text: This powerful invader is certain he will win... Maybe too certain.

name: Prince Arthas
text: No one knows yet, but his heart has already been corrupted by the Lich King's evil.

name: Garrosh Hellscream
text: Thrall's successor is driven by the need for conquest and valorous war.

name: Grommash Hellscream
text: This mighty orc warrior fights a greater battle within himself.

name: Prince Kael'thas
text: Has heard of Jaina's skill but not her love for a different blond prince. It's hard to tell him...

name: Thrall
text: The former warchief has returned to restore the peace, if he can.

name: Warchief Blackhand
text: Uniting the orc clans into the Horde, he has secured dominance over the land.

name: Khiragg
text: The centaur have long feuded with the tauren, fighting over territory and resources.

name: Daelin Proudmoore
text: After the wars, Jaina's father is determined to destroy any remnant of the Horde.

name: Lady Darkscale
text: The vindictive naga often cause trouble on these shorelines...

name: Gorgrom the Dragon-Eater
text: This enormous gronn threatens to destroy Rexxar's people once and for all.

name: Leoroxx
text: Rexxar's father thinks he knows best. But does he truly?

name: Misha
text: Winning the trust of a bear isn't easy. You need patience. And snacks.

name: Ferocious Quilboar
text: These beasts are creating a disturbance. It'd be best to investigate.

name: Prince Anduin Wrynn
text: The son of King Varian is foolish enough to interfere with the Horde.

name: Chieftain Cairne Bloodhoof
text: The tauren chieftain has ample wisdom, leadership experience... and enemies.

name: Garrosh Hellscream
text: Battlecry: Restore #5 Health to your hero. Deal 5 damage to all enemies.

name: Searing Fire Elemental
text: Restless elementals threaten to destroy the Horde city of Orgrimmar!

name: Greatmother Geyah
text: The beloved matriarch of the Mag'har orcs has a message for you.

name: Jaina Proudmoore
text: Her settlement borders Horde land, but not for long...

name: Rehgar Earthfury
text: Thrall's trusted friend and ally wishes to maintain peace with the Alliance.

name: Thrall
text: Thrall has returned, only to lead traitors against the Warchief and the True Horde.

name: Underqueen Zarzhet
text: The undead nerubians were quick to attack the Horde... and their peons.

name: Alonsus Faol
text: The kindly Archbishop has called on your service as war rages across your homeland.

name: Prince Arthas
text: The time has come to face the inevitable.

name: Blackrock Blademaster
text: The defeated orcs have grown in strength again and are kidnapping human villagers!

name: The Dark Portal
text: The Horde came from this mysterious portal, and now they seek to return to it while they still can.

name: Orgrim Doomhammer
text: The Warchief of the Horde and his ruthless army move to conquer Lordaeron.

name: Venim Iceblade
text: Arthas and Jaina were ambushed while investigating a new plague outside the city.

name: Mal'Ganis
text: This dreadlord commands the Scourge against you, impeding your progress.

name: Varok Saurfang
text: Though the Horde retreats, their legendary warriors are still a great threat to the Alliance.

name: Garrosh Hellscream
text: The Warchief of the Horde tangles with powers beyond his imagining! This could get ugly.

name: Jaina Proudmoore
text: The archmage gave you the power to visit her in Theramore whenever you want! Like right now.

name: Moira Thaurissan
text: Help Moira and Varian resolve their differences peacefully before war breaks out!

name: Monkey King
text: Myth holds that this enigmatic figure knew the location of the Harmonic Mallet before he was imprisoned.

name: General Nazgrim
text: Your diplomatic mission to Pandaria was going well—until you were captured by the Horde general.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: The latest Warchief has committed a shocking atrocity against the night elves.

name: King Varian
text: Like every father, Varian only wants what's best for his child. Even if he has no idea what that is...

name: Prophet Velen
text: The ancient leader of the draenei knows much about the Light, but not human nature...

name: Cho'Gall
text: Infamous for aiding Gul'dan, this two-headed ogre became the leader of the Twilight's Hammer.

name: Daerion the Assassin
text: Focused on tracking down his quarry, he has yet to notice your presence...

name: Garona Halforcen
text: Though she assassinated Varian's father years ago, she seems different now. What secret is she keeping?

name: Helka Grimtotem
text: Helka wants you to lead her new gladiator team! She's not at all interested in how you feel about this.

name: Jorach Ravenholdt
text: He has sent a mysterious invitation requesting your presence at his manor.

name: Rehgar Earthfury
text: This skillful trainer has a gift for turning misfits into stars of the fighting arenas.

name: Stasia Fallshadow
text: A suspicious attacker has interrupted a meeting between leaders of the Alliance and Horde.

name: Vendellin Soulfire
text: Each of Varian's foes is more threatening than the last. There's something odd about this one...

name: Archimonde
text: The demons' overlord has finally revealed himself as he leads their invasion on Azeroth.

name: Aedalas Blackmoore
text: A keen fighting enthusiast, he intends to turn a tidy profit off of your matches.

name: Deathwing
text: Once the noble Aspect of Earth, he has betrayed his charge, becoming bent on destruction.

name: Drek'Thar
text: This elder shaman will help you commune with the elements and wield their power.

name: Garrosh
text: Instead of gaining wisdom, he has lost his honor. You must be the one to remove him from command.

name: Jaina
text: Your former friend will use her vast power to attack the Horde in retaliation for her loss at Theramore.

name: Mannoroth
text: Years ago, he tricked the orcs into consuming his blood, allowing demons to control them.

name: Mysterious Stranger
text: He speaks ill of Grommash Hellscream and his efforts to free the imprisoned orcs. But why?

name: Archimonde
text: Millennia have passed, but the demons have finally returned to invade Azeroth once more.

name: Cenarius
text: The ancient Forest Lord chose you to become his pupil after looking deeply into your heart.

name: Illidan
text: Your brother's demonic powers have changed him, and he's lashing out against his own allies.

name: Illidan
text: Embittered against his own people, Illidan has resisted Maiev's attempts to return him to his prison.

name: Bear Form
text:
[x]Replace your Hero Power
 with Feral Strength
(Restore 2 Health to your hero
for each friendly minion.)

name: Cat Form
text:
[x]Replace your Hero Power
 with Feral Frenzy
(Gain 2 Attack for each
friendly minion.)

name: Mannoroth
text: This mighty pit lord leads the demon army using the Well of Eternity as a portal to bring in more invaders.

name: Ragnaros
text: The Fire Lord will burn down the World Tree unless you and the other guardians stop him!

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
text: Tensions between the Horde and Alliance have reached the breaking point under the new warchief.

name: Xavius
text: The source of corruption within the Emerald Dream has never been revealed... until now.

name: Chieftains of the Horde
text: The hour has come to corrupt the orcs so they will serve as Kil'jaeden's army.

name: Medivh
text: Despite the great distance, this powerful stranger has invaded your mind in a sudden vision!

name: Ner'zhul
text: Respected by all the orc clans, Ner'zhul will be instrumental to your master's plans.

name: Orgrim Doomhammer
text: The tides of war have turned in favor of this insolent upstart. As warchief, he now controls your fate.

name: Fallen Soldier
text: War has taken its toll on the people of Azeroth. Perhaps you could use this to your advantage...

name: Throne of the Elements
text: Young shaman traditionally visit this landmark to receive the elements' blessings and power.

name: Tomb Guardian
text: By betraying Orgrim, you can divert your forces to the Tomb of Sargeras and seize its power for your own.

name: Forgotten Warrior
text: No one living remembers the leader of Gul'dan's village, but the legacy of his cruelty outlasted him.

name: Akama
text: Once your closest ally, Akama has plotted against you in the shadows, and now he makes his move.

name: Anub'arak
text: The Lich King has called Anub'arak and Prince Arthas to serve him. They must not succeed.

name: Prince Arthas
text: To prove your brother wrong, you must clear the forests of any foes, no matter how dangerous…

name: Death Knight Arthas
text: If Arthas reaches the Lich King in the Frozen Throne, all is lost. This is your final chance to stop him.

name: Magtheridon
text: This pit lord has conquered the shattered world of Outland, or so he thinks…

name: Maiev Shadowsong
text: Having appointed herself as your jailer for millennia, she is obsessed with recapturing you.

name: Malfurion Stormrage
text: He's appeared at the worst possible moment—when your essential spell is nearly complete!

name: Tichondrius
text: Defeating this demon and stealing his power will suit your aims and your brother's… right?

name: Abyssal Jailor
text: Only tremendous perseverance could conquer the darkness of these cells.

name: Queen Azshara
text: If this is the end, at least you will face it knowing the truth.

name: Captain Maya
text: This brave captain needs some help before everything goes overboard!

name: Enchanted Statue
text: Carved in the likeness of Priestess Ithu'liel, this statue seems to stare right into your soul.

name: Cousin Errgl
text: Though an infrequent and rather disruptive visitor, Errgl is always welcome at the Mrrglton household.

name: Handmaiden Zainra
text: Dedicated to the court at an early age, Zainra never approved of your friendship with Dathril.

name: Captain Hooktusk
text: Pirates consider it an honor to lose to her, given her reputation... but you're not a pirate.

name: Hurricane Elemental
text: The elements themselves seem to have turned against you as they rage across the open sea...

name: The Leviathan
text: You've hired the best possible vessel and its engineer, Ini Stormcoil, to take you to the ruins of Zin-Azshari.

name: The Leviathan
text: The crew is ready to begin the voyage! But is the submarine...?

name: The Leviathan
text: This vessel runs a lot more smoothly when the water is on the outside and not the inside.

name: The Leviathan
text: Tangling with a kraken has left catastrophic damage, as well as some stowaways!

name: The Leviathan
text: You'll need every trick in the book to get it going THIS time.

name: Ol' Rattleswipe
text: He's got a keen eye for loot, but sometimes throwing gold around can work against him.

name: Murgaloc
text: Its level of aggression is concerning... even for a murloc.

name: Naga Guard
text: Even if the territorial naga are here, it's impossible to back out now.

name: Privateer Tom
text: If Grace needs to confront the captain of this ship, we'd better get to it!

name: Ozumat
text: This great behemoth lurks beneath the waves, waiting to entrap its unwary prey...

name: Ruins of House Evenlar
text: After so many long years, it is finally time to let go of the past.

name: Mysterious Visitor
text: Who would interrupt at a time like this?

name: Bag of Burgled Spells
text: Your spells summon a random minion of the same cost!

name: Cloneball!
text: Your deck is made of random Legendary minions, cloned four times!

name: When Clones Attack!
text: Every minion you play will generate a 1/1 clone!

name: The Masked Ball
text: After you summon a minion, give it "Deathrattle: Summon a minion that costs (2) less."

name: Randomonium
text: Each turn your cards' cost are randomized!

name: Battle of Tol Barad
text: Play a minion and get a random spell of the same cost, but for free!

name: Catacomb Treasures!
text: Complete your quest to get an awesome treasure!

name: The Void Singularity
text: Your minions become crushed into a single powerful entity of light!

name: Yellow-Brick Brawl
text: Start the game with Dorothee!

name: Valeera the Hollow

name: Atramedes
text: He eats E.V.I.L. for breakfast, but only if there’s nothing G.O.O.D. around.

name: Garr
text: It’s gonna be a rocky road with no chance of marshmallows.

name: Baron Geddon
text: Whatever you do, never arm a Geddon.

name: Nefarian
text: Also goes by Victor Nefarius. He’s subtle like that.

name: Omnotron Defense System
text: Programmed to delete all intruders!

name: Highlord Omokk
text: He’ll show you a smashing time!

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
text: Excellent firelord and insect repeller.

name: Vaelastrasz the Corrupt
text: Too corrupt to care about your innocent little cards.

name: Brann Bronzebeard
text: Last seen near the Un'Goro Crater.

name: Brann Bronzebeard
text: Work co-operatively with Brann to defeat King Krush, Untamed!

name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
text: Last seen exploring the deserts of Tanaris.

name: Buried Finley
text: Clear the Piles of Sand and damage Buried Finley to dig him up!

name: Reno Jackson
text: Last seen "exploring" near the Dalaran Crater.

name: Reno Jackson
text: Reno's out of control! Defeat him to bring him to his senses!

name: Dark Pharaoh Tekahn
text: A villain revealed!

name: Terraviss
text: A shadowy figure was spotted near the gates of Uldum.

name: Aviator Bob
text: Bob can give you a second chance, even if you've had a third rate run.

name: Bookmaster Bae Chao
text: There's a new librarian in town, and she won't stand for tardiness.

name: Brann Bronzebeard
text:
[x]Riding on a dinosaur
and looking for a fight, 
Brann's ready to finish this.

name: Elise Starseeker
text: She has a bad feeling about this.

name: Elise Starseeker
text: She has a bad feeling about this.

name: Sir Finley
text: Has any opponent ever been THIS worthy?

name: Sir Finley
text: Has any opponent ever been THIS worthy?

name: Murgatha
text: Started off as an unofficial Hagatha impersonator, then took it too far…

name: Orgrimmar Guard
text: It was just another day on the job for him until these explorers showed up…

name: Reno Jackson
text:
[x]With a bag full of treasures 
and a well-styled moustache,
 Reno is ready to take 
Tekahn down!

name: Reno's Junkpile
text: Includes dangerous spells, unread notes to self, and somewhere, a portal spell.

name: Tak Nozwhisker
text: Looks like the League of E.V.I.L.'s missing a kobold—a very angry kobold.

name: Primodino
text: He was surprised to learn that he's only a league away from dinner!

name: White King
text: This enchanted chess piece is used to playing with more dignified party guests.

name: Ammunae
text: He can teach you life lessons, but they're harsh ones.

name: Battrund
text: Not all of Battrund's minions are mummies. Some got a bad wrap.

name: Brann Bronzebeard
text:
[x]Riding on a dinosaur
and looking for a fight, 
Brann's ready to finish this.

name: Colossus of the Sun
text: Sworn foe of anything that throws shade.

name: Elise Starseeker
text:
[x]Whether she needs magic
or a trusty machete, Elise 
is ready to save Uldum.

name: Sir Finley
text:
[x]Sir Finley rides into battle,
ready to dispense justice 
against his final foe.

name: Headless Horseman (no head)
text: He's seen the battle in Uldum! Now he's here in this tomb!

name: Ichabod the Cursed
text: He's reckless and infectious!

name: Isiset
text: She'll either spell your doom, or Twinspell it to show off!

name: Totally Normal Jar
text: It's almost… TOO normal.

name: Jythiros of Questions
text: [x]A riddle... within a mystery...in an enigma... with a funny head.

name: Kasmut
text: Can sniff out explorers and evildoers with ease.

name: Kham
text: Calm Kham down if you want to calmly down Kham.

name: Lich Baz'hial
text: Which league freezes faster? She must find out!

name: Octosari
text: You can count on Octosari to keep the numbers balanced.

name: Pillager Drasar
text: If she asks you about treasure, you don't have any!

name: Rajh
text: The Mighty Lord of the Sun shines brightest when casting spells.

name: Reno Jackson
text:
[x]With a bag full of treasures 
and a well-styled moustache,
 Reno is ready to take 
Tekahn down!

name: Setesh
text: Just your typical bad dog, destroying everything.

name: Sothis
text: Titan security is very serious. Stone-faced, even.

name: Ol' Toomba
text: Ol' Toomba the treasure hunter isn't above copying homework.

name: Trap Room
text: Is it still a trap if everyone knows it's a trap?

name: Dark Ritualist Zafarr
text: Believes his rituals are better than anyone else's.

name: Zaraam
text: Zaraam grows in strength the more his minions suffer.

name: Headless Horseman
text: He's seen the battle in Uldum! Now he's here in this tomb!

name: Aranna Starseeker
text: A natural leader always comes out on top!

name: Elise of the Wasteland
text: Has some serious questions about her sister's recent activities.

name: Illidan Stormrage
text: The Lord of Outland is looking forward to a rematch!

name: Karnuk
text: As a priest turned demon hunter, he's basically capable of anything.

name: Kriziki
text: Sought peace and quiet in Outland, but instead found demon hunters. LOTS of demon hunters.

name: Mecha-Jaraxxus
text: With rage and rust, he has been rebuilt!

name: Shalja
text: Even in the middle of a desert, she'll ensure her foes are all washed up.

name: Sklibb
text: He's proof that in Zangarmarsh, the mushrooms hunt YOU!

name: Deathstalker Rexxar
text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions.

flavor: If you can dodge an axe, you can dodge a ball.
name: Zul'jin
text: [x]Battlecry: Cast all spells you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).

name: War Master Voone
text: The Warmaster is a triple threat: He rocks. He rolls. He trolls!

name: Zentimo
text: This creepy swamp shaman is packing some bad voodoo.

name: Captain Hooktusk
text: Those who say her cheating goes over[d]board soon follow suit.

name: High Priest Thekal
text: Floats like a feather. Stings like a troll punching your face.

name: Zul'jin
text: Zul'jin's not ready to bury the hatchet. Unless it's in your shrine.

name: Wardruid Loti
text: She and her raptors aim to prove the wild side is the winning side.

name: High Priestess Jeklik
text: Her blood magic brings on spells, demons, and hurt feelings.

name: Hex Lord Malacrass
text: Malacrass is on fire this year! And sometimes frost.

name: Princess Talanji
text: Her family bargained with the loa of death. That's bad. For you.

name: Waste Wanderer Cardish
text: Even if he bombs, he's having a blast freelancing for E.V.I.L.

name: Dark Ritualist Zafarr
text: Likes his rituals like he likes his coffee: Dark. [x]And twice-brewed.

name: Vera Ridley
text: Her lackeys aren't lacking when it comes to workplace benefits.

name: Nash the Greatworm
text: Rumor has it this is merely the other end of Gnosh the Greatworm.

name: Glack the Scorpid
text: Elise's journal entry for Glack simply says, "Don't get stung".

name: Mister Chu
text: Chu bravely volunteered to "guard" this [x]treasure-filled tomb.

name: Squeamlish
text: She's mastered more terrifying forms. Like squirrel. And mushroom.

name: Sinkhole
text: The best way to avoid a sinkhole is to - oh, too late.

name: Demolisher 3V-11
text: Rafaam got a great deal on one of these at a Horde surplus auction.

name: Terraviss
text: Slithering into the tombs to snake a few spells and weapons.

name: R.O.B.O.L.D.
text: They rebuilt the Kobold Barbarian. Faster. Stronger. Flamier.

name: Pyramad
text: Earth. Air. Fire. Water... Pyramid.

name: Snakeflinger Scalesnout
text: Snakes with pointed snouts are venomous. And the best ammo.

name: Sword Dancer Sirinell
text: It is said that sethrak sword dancers are the bane of kings.

name: Lt. Herring
text: Leads the dreaded E.V.I.L. Puffertroopers, AKA "The Flying Fish."

name: Battrund
text: Not all of Battrund's minions are mummies. Some got a bad wrap.

name: Ichabod the Cursed
text: These gnomes are cursed! And you, too, will curse them.

name: Twizzleflux
text: Twizzleflux is spreading the very curse that maligned him.

name: Sothis
text: This terrible titan watcher has his own personal army.

name: Kham
text: Now you see him, now you don't, now you're impaled.

name: Illidara Sunsdawn
text: The Reliquary is here, and their discoveries are bad news for you.

name: Colossus of the Sun
text: This titan colossus abhors all weakness.

name: Skarik
text: This king cobra is also the King of Beasts.

name: Suspicious Palm Tree
text: This oasis would've been welcome if Hagatha hadn't gotten here first.

name: Beetle Herder Zenda
text: Beetle stampedes are terrifying. It's the rumble[x] of those teeny-tiny feet.

name: Thudd Lockspring
text: Is it really a magical "wand" when it's got a trigger and full auto?

name: Ol' Toomba
text: Ol' Toomba the treasure hunter isn't above copying homework.

name: Sazin
text: With sand and fury the hot winds blow. Where did your minions go?

name: Ozara
text: Ozara of the sands believes that the Dust Devil is in the details.

name: Ermavar
text: The first of her name, Ermavar is revered as the waker of flame.

name: Pillager Drasar
text: Drasar generously shares stolen treasures with her minions.

name: Edra
text: The ancient lifewardens guard this sacred space with their life(steal).

name: Runaway Ruby
text: [x]Gnomes put tank treads on a submarine for desert use. Because gnomes.

name: Dovo Fastfuse
text: Dovo's excavation methods put the "boom" in "tomb".

name: Earthrager Ptah
text: Avoid meeting Ptah's gaze. Or standing next to anyone who does.

name: Kasa Softspeaker
text: The Plague of Madness has not been kind to [x]once-gentle Kasa.

name: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
text: The third plague rests in [x]final breath: You face the ancient Lord of Death!

name: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
text: The third plague rests in [x]final breath: You face the ancient Lord of Death!

name: Xatma, Plague Lord of Death
text: The third plague rests in [x]final breath: You face the ancient Lord of Death!

name: K'zrath, Plague Lord of Madness
text: The second plague is in the brain: Among these [x]dunes, Madness reigns.

name: K'zrath, Plague Lord of Madness
text: The second plague is in the brain: Among these [x]dunes, Madness reigns.

name: K'zrath, Plague Lord of Madness
text: The second plague is in the brain: Among these [x]dunes, Madness reigns.

name: Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs
text: [x]The first plague is a finful pox: Beware, beware the Lord of 'Locs.

name: Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs
text: [x]The first plague is a finful pox: Beware, beware the Lord of 'Locs.

name: Vesh, Plague Lord of Murlocs
text: [x]The first plague is a finful pox: Beware, beware the Lord of 'Locs.

name: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
text: The fourth plague roots within the heart: Wrath tears friend and foe apart.

name: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
text: The fourth plague roots within the heart: Wrath tears friend and foe apart.

name: Icarax, Plague Lord of Wrath
text: The fourth plague roots within the heart: Wrath tears friend and foe apart.

name: Alda Petrik
text: Alda's learned some tricks. Like sit. Stay. Loot. Summon beasts.

name: Sandshaper Rhogi
text: Rhogi is a sand conjurer. He copies minions. And makes a mean castle.

name: Jolene Knottley
text: Jolene's writing is absolute madness. Her grammar is worse.

name: Trap Room
text: Reno is especially good at detecting traps. With his face.

name: Belloc Brightblade
text: This smarmy leader of the Reliquary is a thief of the highest order.

name: Wildtooth
text: "Sand sharks aren't real" according to a [x]half-eaten journal.

name: Totally Normal Jar
text: You should be wary when treasures walk right up to you.

name: Ilza Grimdrum
text: Ilza is an arena champion known as [x]'The Cruel Dueler.'

name: Craz
text: This belong to Craz! Go away, or Craz will bring his tiny friends!

name: Ol' Barkeye
text: Frustrated with just a rifle, Ol' Barkeye has taken up the blade.

name: Kasmut
text: This anubisath over-achiever prefers to [x]re-raise the extra dead.

name: Lich Baz'hial
text: Baz'hial has cheated death. She also cheats at cards.

name: Taskmaster Maru
text: This agent of E.V.I.L. is never lacking for lackeys.

name: Janak
text: This scheming hozen heads up E.V.I.L.'s desert cavalry.

name: Water-Toting Murlocs
text: Years of experience tell you not to ignore this terrible threat.

name: Sand Puffer Frog
text: One puff's enough to bluff a minion's stuff.

name: Winged Guardian
text: This great beast's roar bolsters allies and terrifies its foes.

name: Jythiros of Questions
text: [x]A riddle... within a mystery...in an enigma... with a funny head.

name: Dire Bat
text: They wouldn't be a problem if you just stopped feeding them.

name: Zaraam
text: Zaraam grows in strength the more his minions suffer.

name: Kyriss
text: Line up all your minions. It'll be hilarious.

name: A Beautiful Oasis
text: Merciful shade. Fresh cool water. A perfectly [x]balanced meta. Is it real?

name: Vessina
text: If impatience is an E.V.I.L. virtue, Vessina must be a saint.

name: Thrud
text: And some people think rogues need to be sneaky.

name: Siamat
text: [x]The South Winds (usually) bring exactly what Siamat wanted.

name: Tekahn, Plague Lord of Flame
text: The fifth plague, Tekhan laid claim: behold the mighty Lord of Flame!

name: Weaponized Wasp
text: Unlike bees, wasps can keep stinging you. With a laser.

name: Isiset
text: In the deft hands of the Mistress of Magic, any spell can be a Twinspell.

name: Rajh
text: The mighty Lord of the Sun shines brightest when casting spells.

name: Ammunae
text: Every party needs a healer. And nobody partied like the titans.

name: Setesh
text: [x]Setesh curses minions... Without even getting to know them first.

name: General Husam
text: Those who serve under General Husam are in a rush to leave.

name: High Prophet Barim
text: Barim “prophets” from the misfortune of others.

name: Avozu
text: Avozu the Hunter will stop at nothing until his prey is subdued.

name: Tarkus
text: Violence begets violence. Tarkus begets a whole lot.

name: Gorebite
text: If it opens its mouth, you should run. Double-time.

name: Octosari
text: His favorite number is 7. Disrupt its perfection at your own peril!

name: Armadillobot
text: Is it insane to let a critter pilot a mech? Dr. Boom thinks not.

name: Bazaar Bob
text: [x]The friendliest face you could hope to meet in a plague-ridden desert.

name: Brann Bronzebeard
text:
[x]Riding on a dinosaur
and looking for a fight, 
Brann's ready to finish this.

name: Elise Starseeker
text:
[x]Whether she needs magic
or a trusty machete, Elise 
is ready to save Uldum.

text:
[x]Sir Finley rides into battle,
ready to dispense justice 
against his final foe.

name: Reno Jackson
text:
[x]With a bag full of treasures 
and a well-styled mustache,
 Reno is ready to take 
Tekahn down!

flavor: "Reno!" "Please address me by my proper title." " Amazing Reno..."
name: The Amazing Reno
text: Battlecry: Make all minions disappear. *Poof!*
